TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I leave this message seeking help with a matter!
SOLANUM: A scroll I took from within the tower slipped from my grasp as I fell into the pool! (I could not find a whiteboard to read it with nearby, and so took it with me..)
SOLANUM: I dived into the pool to try retrieve it; but the long, electrifying tentacles of the pool's inhabitant fiercely guards the scroll at the bottom of the pool!
SOLANUM: I feel deeply ashamed leaving this scroll polluting the lifeform's habitat for now, but I have already received a few shocks trying to retrieve it..
SOLANUM: If anyone who finds this message knows how to beseech the lifeform to budge so the scroll can be retrieved safely, I would be most grateful if you would kindly do so in my stead!
